arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Live coverage of the Parisians’ pre-match
arts.sum: This Tuesday, as part of Matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Champions League, first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face second-place Bayern Munich at the Parc des Princes. While kickoff is at 9 p.m. CET, the club is offering a live pre-match coverage of the players’ warm-ups starting at 7:45 p.m. Watch the live stream here:
